message.body: Hey. I want sushi. At La Fusion. This weekend. Please? Lol
Mmmm sushi!! Lol sat should be good for us. I know steph has bowling at 4 but free after that
Can I see if Mike and his friends can come?
I also need to tell you something lol. Soon.
You going to dinner wed night?
It's not something I'll bring up in front of anyone tho. Only Michael knows. Eden too.
I figured that im too stressed now with a thOusand things to do but ill be fine everything by wed night. So ill actually be able to talk then
Oh yea.. That's true. Well it'd be a funny story to laugh at. How's everything?
Hey, I didn't pass the vision exam today. My uncorrected vision is so bad i don't meet the minimum requirements. So I can't be a police officer
:/ that #####! What about an updated vision exam? Can your glasses be corrected? Can you get a waiver??
No with my glasses im 20/20... its without correction I failed. With out glasses I need to read the first three lines of the chart perfectly and I couldn't even read the second line
:/ and honestly is that worth it? What will you do?
Honestly I don't even qualify for the surgery right now. Can't only get it when your vision stabilizes. Mine still changes every year a little
For now I can't do anything regarding it. Now I just have to hope I get the probation officer position instead
